title: Crafting Scaleable Stylesheets
description:
One of the best things about CSS is that it's easy to learn, and a breeze to update. One of the *worst* things about CSS is that it's easy to learn, and a *breeze* to update. A blessing and a curse, you might say. This session will propose practical methods of creating scalable, organized and maintainable stylesheets by use of Sass, Compass and a handful of other tools.Topics Discussed:

* Refusing to be bothered by browser prefixes (seriously... do it).
* Writing object-oriented CSS (yes, really).
* Minimizing code duplication.
* Separation of concerns (in the context of stylesheets).
* Getting your company or team up and running.
